payerNumber.heading: E-Collection code format setting
payerNumber.description: Setting generating method of e-collection code
payerNumber.descriptionAuto: E-Collection code will be generated automatically based on registered payer's phone number.
payerNumber.descriptionManual: E-Collection code will be generated randomly by system.

eCollectionCode.heading: E-Collection code format setting
eCollectionCode.description: Setting generating method of e-collection code
eCollectionCode.descriptionPhone: E-Collection code will be generated automatically based on registered payer's phone number
eCollectionCode.descriptionRandom: E-Collection code will be generated randomly by system
